ComicInfo.Summary:
As the Great Enemies plot to destroy the God of Thunder, the last of their ancient foes, Thor fights to free slaves laboring in a deadly mine on the rim of Helheim, the kingdom of the dead. The recovered ore is being turned into magical sword blades that will enable the despotic ruler of the upper levels of Helheim to conquer the Dusk Lands with fire and blood.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Walter Simonson (a) & Laura Martin (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Walter Simonson | 2 |
